name: Spring is Coming (reejk)
description:
Have you ever wanted to kick away the winter so that the weather gets warmer? Now you can!

Just melt the snow in the forest. But carefully, the snowmen will be angry and try to stop you.

Controls:
- VR Motion Controller Trigger to radiate heat

Tested only on Oculus.

Used sounds from freesound.org:
- https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/sounds/456962/
- https://freesound.org/people/rhodesmas/sounds/320655/
- https://freesound.org/people/Xythe/sounds/115831/
- https://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sounds/219017/
- https://freesound.org/people/Nic3_one/sounds/166542/
- https://freesound.org/people/BEDEEN/sounds/425046/
